Otago man wins $5.3m Lotto Powerball with same numbers used for five years https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/otago-man-wins-53m-lotto-powerball-with-same-numbers-used-for-five-years/MPIRCQ2HY5HARIZM6RP4JXGR54/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/otago-man-wins-53m-lotto-powerball-with-same-numbers-used-for-five-years/MPIRCQ2HY5HARIZM6RP4JXGR54/ He celebrated with close family, enjoying champagne and a home-cooked dinner. Thu, 27 Mar 2025 21:08:35 +0000 An Otago man won $5.3m after five years of playing the same Lotto Powerball numbers, a practice he first adopted during the Covid-19 lockdown.
